attributes.action: Investigate whether the Labour Party is guilty of electoral fraud & vote rigging
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition to show your support for true democractic process.
Thank you.
attributes.background: Many people have registered to vote in the Labour leadership election, who are genuine Labour supporters and yet they have been contacted to say that their votes have been disallowed.  It would appear that the Labour Party is intending to rig this election.  This needs to be investigated & stopped.

rejection.details:
The Labour leadership election isn't something that the UK Government or Parliament are responsible for. It is an internal matter for the Labour Party.

The National Executive Committee (NEC) is the governing body of the Labour Party. You may wish to raise your concerns directly with the NEC.
